meanings.sent1: The little dog was yaffing at the mailman.
meanings.sent2: The neighborhood dogs started yaffing when the fireworks went off.
meanings.sent3: The yaffing of the puppy woke up the whole house.
meanings.sent4: The yaffing of the coyotes echoed through the night.
meanings.sent5: The yaffing of the excited children filled the playground with joy.

meanings.sent1: The yaffing of the sirens could be heard from far away.
meanings.sent2: The yaffing of the seagulls signaled the approaching storm.
meanings.sent3: The yaffing of the alarm clock startled me awake.
meanings.sent4: The yaffing of the tea kettle reminded her it was time for tea.
meanings.sent5: The yaffing of the car horns in the city created a chaotic symphony.
